title: Earn 2,000 Bonus Points Per Night at Carlson Hotels
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > Earn 2,000 Bonus Points Per Night at Carlson Hotels Earn 2,000 Bonus Points Per Night at Carlson Hotels by Tim Winship - July 7, 2015 at 10:11 AM 
This isn't the most generous Carlson promotion in recent memory. But as summer hotel offers go, it's not bad. 
Offer Details 
Between July 7 and September 27, Club Carlson members can earn 2,000 bonus points for every Carlson Rezidor night booked on a Carlson website or mobile app. 
Registration is required. 
Deal or No Deal 
Club Carlson members normally earn 20 points per $1 spent. Assuming a hypothetical stay of one $100 night, you'd earn 2,000 points. In that scenario, a 2,000-point bonus amounts to earning double points. 
Viewed from a different perspective, free nights in the Club Carlson program can be had for as few as 9,000 points. So two one-night stays at $150 each, including the bonuses, could qualify you for a free night at a Category 1 hotel. And three one-night stays could qualify for a Category 2 hotel award night, which costs 15,000 points. 
All in all, this is a decent bonus that is readily earnable. 
The Carlson mobile app is available for both Apple and Android platforms.
